trans-unit.source: Provide a specific local reference code, control number, or other unique identifier. The country and repository code will be automatically added from the linked repository record to form a full reference code. (NOBRADE 1.1)
trans-unit.target: Provide a specific local reference code, control number, or other unique identifier. The country and repository code will be automatically added from the linked repository record to form a full reference code. (NOBRADE 1.1)

trans-unit.source: Provide either a formal title or a concise supplied title in accordance with the rules of multilevel description and national conventions. (NOBRADE 1.2)
trans-unit.target: Provide either a formal title or a concise supplied title in accordance with the rules of multilevel description and national conventions. (NOBRADE 1.2)

trans-unit.source: "Identify and record the date(s) of the unit of description. Identify the type of date given. Record as a single date or a range of dates as appropriate.” (NOBRADE 1.3). The Date display field can be used to enter free-text date information, including typographical marks to express approximation, uncertainty, or qualification. Use the start and end fields to make the dates searchable. Do not use any qualifiers or typographical symbols to express uncertainty. Acceptable date formats: YYYYMMDD, YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, YYYY.
trans-unit.target: "Identify and record the date(s) of the unit of description. Identify the type of date given. Record as a single date or a range of dates as appropriate.” (NOBRADE 1.3). The Date display field can be used to enter free-text date information, including typographical marks to express approximation, uncertainty, or qualification. Use the start and end fields to make the dates searchable. Do not use any qualifiers or typographical symbols to express uncertainty. Acceptable date formats: YYYYMMDD, YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, YYYY.

trans-unit.source: Record the level of this unit of description. (NOBRADE 1.4)
trans-unit.target: Record the level of this unit of description. (NOBRADE 1.4)

trans-unit.source: %1%Level of description%2% - This is a %3%mandatory%4% element.
trans-unit.target: %1%Level of description%2% - This is a %3%mandatory%4% element.

trans-unit.source: %1%Level of description%2% - Value "%value%" is not consistent with higher levels.
trans-unit.target: %1%Level of description%2% - Value "%value%" is not consistent with higher levels.

trans-unit.source: Identifier: Provide a specific local reference code, control number, or other unique identifier. Level of description: Record the level of this unit of description. Title: Provide either a formal title or a concise supplied title in accordance with the rules of multilevel description and national conventions.
trans-unit.target: Identifier: Provide a specific local reference code, control number, or other unique identifier. Level of description: Record the level of this unit of description. Title: Provide either a formal title or a concise supplied title in accordance with the rules of multilevel description and national conventions.

trans-unit.source: Record the extent of the unit of description by giving the number of physical or logical units in arabic numerals and the unit of measurement. Give the specific medium (media) of the unit of description. Separate multiple extents with a linebreak. (NOBRADE 1.5)
trans-unit.target: Record the extent of the unit of description by giving the number of physical or logical units in arabic numerals and the unit of measurement. Give the specific medium (media) of the unit of description. Separate multiple extents with a linebreak. (NOBRADE 1.5)

trans-unit.source: %1%Extent and medium%2% - This is a %3%mandatory%4% element.
trans-unit.target: %1%Extent and medium%2% - This is a %3%mandatory%4% element.

trans-unit.source: Record the name of the organization which has custody of the archival material. (NOBRADE 2.1) Search for an existing name in the archival institution records by typing the first few characters of the name. Alternatively, type a new name to create and link to a new archival institution record.
trans-unit.target: Record the name of the organization which has custody of the archival material. (NOBRADE 2.1) Search for an existing name in the archival institution records by typing the first few characters of the name. Alternatively, type a new name to create and link to a new archival institution record.

trans-unit.source: This archival description, or one of its higher levels, %1%requires%2% at least one %3%creator%4%.
trans-unit.target: This archival description, or one of its higher levels, %1%requires%2% at least one %3%creator%4%.

trans-unit.source: This archival description, or one of its higher levels, requires at least one creator.
trans-unit.target: This archival description, or one of its higher levels, requires at least one creator.

trans-unit.source: Record the name of the organization(s) or the individual(s) responsible for the creation, accumulation and maintenance of the records in the unit of description. (NOBRADE 2.1) Search for an existing name in the authority records by typing the first few characters of the name. Alternatively, type a new name to create and link to a new authority record. (NOBRADE 2.1)
trans-unit.target: Record the name of the organization(s) or the individual(s) responsible for the creation, accumulation and maintenance of the records in the unit of description. (NOBRADE 2.1) Search for an existing name in the authority records by typing the first few characters of the name. Alternatively, type a new name to create and link to a new authority record. (NOBRADE 2.1)

trans-unit.source: Record the successive transfers of ownership, responsibility and/or custody of the unit of description and indicate those actions, such as history of the arrangement, production of contemporary finding aids, re-use of the records for other purposes or software migrations, that have contributed to its present structure and arrangement. Give the dates of these actions, insofar as they can be ascertained. If the archival history is unknown, record that information. (NOBRADE 2.3)
trans-unit.target: Record the successive transfers of ownership, responsibility and/or custody of the unit of description and indicate those actions, such as history of the arrangement, production of contemporary finding aids, re-use of the records for other purposes or software migrations, that have contributed to its present structure and arrangement. Give the dates of these actions, insofar as they can be ascertained. If the archival history is unknown, record that information. (NOBRADE 2.3)

trans-unit.source: Immediate source of acquisition or transfer
trans-unit.target: Immediate source of acquisition or transfer

trans-unit.source: Record the source from which the unit of description was acquired and the date and/or method of acquisition if any or all of this information is not confidential. If the source is unknown, record that information. Optionally, add accession numbers or codes. (NOBRADE 2.4)
trans-unit.target: Registre a origem imediata da unidade de descrição (nome da entidade que encaminhou), a forma e data de aquisição, se possível com as referências pertinentes (instrumento formal de encaminhamento e/ou recebimento como uma correspondência, o número e data da mesma, números ou códigos de entrada da unidade de descrição etc.). Se a origem for desconhecida, recorra à expressão "dado não disponível". (NOBRADE 2.4)

trans-unit.source: Give a summary of the scope (such as, time periods, geography) and content, (such as documentary forms, subject matter, administrative processes) of the unit of description, appropriate to the level of description. (NOBRADE 3.1)
trans-unit.target: Give a summary of the scope (such as, time periods, geography) and content, (such as documentary forms, subject matter, administrative processes) of the unit of description, appropriate to the level of description. (NOBRADE 3.1)

trans-unit.source: Record appraisal, destruction and scheduling actions taken on or planned for the unit of description, especially if they may affect the interpretation of the material. (NOBRADE 3.2)
trans-unit.target: Record appraisal, destruction and scheduling actions taken on or planned for the unit of description, especially if they may affect the interpretation of the material. (NOBRADE 3.2)

trans-unit.source: Indicate if accruals are expected. Where appropriate, give an estimate of their quantity and frequency. (NOBRADE 3.3)
trans-unit.target: Indicate if accruals are expected. Where appropriate, give an estimate of their quantity and frequency. (NOBRADE 3.3)

trans-unit.source: Specify the internal structure, order and/or the system of classification of the unit of description. Note how these have been treated by the archivist. For electronic records, record or reference information on system design. (NOBRADE 3.4)
trans-unit.target: Specify the internal structure, order and/or the system of classification of the unit of description. Note how these have been treated by the archivist. For electronic records, record or reference information on system design. (NOBRADE 3.4)

trans-unit.source: Conditions of access and use area
trans-unit.target: Conditions of access and use area

trans-unit.source: Edit conditions of access and use area
trans-unit.target: Edit conditions of access and use area

trans-unit.source: Specify the law or legal status, contract, regulation or policy that affects access to the unit of description. Indicate the extent of the period of closure and the date at which the material will open when appropriate. (NOBRADE 4.1)
trans-unit.target: Specify the law or legal status, contract, regulation or policy that affects access to the unit of description. Indicate the extent of the period of closure and the date at which the material will open when appropriate. (NOBRADE 4.1)

trans-unit.source: Give information about conditions, such as copyright, governing the reproduction of the unit of description after access has been provided. If the existence of such conditions is unknown, record this. If there are no conditions, no statement is necessary. (NOBRADE 4.2)
trans-unit.target: Give information about conditions, such as copyright, governing the reproduction of the unit of description after access has been provided. If the existence of such conditions is unknown, record this. If there are no conditions, no statement is necessary. (NOBRADE 4.2)

trans-unit.source: Record the language(s) of the materials comprising the unit of description. (NOBRADE 4.3)
trans-unit.target: Record the language(s) of the materials comprising the unit of description. (NOBRADE 4.3)

trans-unit.source: Record the script(s) of the materials comprising the unit of description. (NOBRADE 4.3)
trans-unit.target: Record the script(s) of the materials comprising the unit of description. (NOBRADE 4.3)

trans-unit.source: Language and script notes of material
trans-unit.target: Language and script notes of material

trans-unit.source: Note any distinctive alphabets, scripts, symbol systems or abbreviations employed. (NOBRADE 4.3)
trans-unit.target: Note any distinctive alphabets, scripts, symbol systems or abbreviations employed. (NOBRADE 4.3)

trans-unit.source: Indicate any important physical conditions, such as preservation requirements, that affect the use of the unit of description. Note any software and/or hardware required to access the unit of description. (NOBRADE 4.4)
trans-unit.target: Indicate any important physical conditions, such as preservation requirements, that affect the use of the unit of description. Note any software and/or hardware required to access the unit of description. (NOBRADE 4.4)

trans-unit.source: Give information about any finding aids that the repository or records creator may have that provide information relating to the context and contents of the unit of description. If appropriate, include information on where to obtain a copy. (NOBRADE 4.5)
trans-unit.target: Give information about any finding aids that the repository or records creator may have that provide information relating to the context and contents of the unit of description. If appropriate, include information on where to obtain a copy. (NOBRADE 4.5)

trans-unit.source: If the original of the unit of description is available (either in the institution or elsewhere) record its location, together with any significant control numbers. If the originals no longer exist, or their location is unknown, give that information. (NOBRADE 5.1)
trans-unit.target: If the original of the unit of description is available (either in the institution or elsewhere) record its location, together with any significant control numbers. If the originals no longer exist, or their location is unknown, give that information. (NOBRADE 5.1)

trans-unit.source: If the copy of the unit of description is available (either in the institution or elsewhere) record its location, together with any significant control numbers. (NOBRADE 5.2)
trans-unit.target: If the copy of the unit of description is available (either in the institution or elsewhere) record its location, together with any significant control numbers. (NOBRADE 5.2)

trans-unit.source: Record information about units of description in the same repository or elsewhere that are related by provenance or other association(s). Use appropriate introductory wording and explain the nature of the relationship . If the related unit of description is a finding aid, use the finding aids element of description (4.5) to make the reference to it. (NOBRADE 5.3)
trans-unit.target: Record information about units of description in the same repository or elsewhere that are related by provenance or other association(s). Use appropriate introductory wording and explain the nature of the relationship . If the related unit of description is a finding aid, use the finding aids element of description (4.5) to make the reference to it. (NOBRADE 5.3)

trans-unit.source: To create a relationship between this description and another description held in AtoM, begin typing the name of the related description and select it from the autocomplete drop-down menu when it appears below. Multiple relationships can be created.
trans-unit.target: To create a relationship between this description and another description held in AtoM, begin typing the name of the related description and select it from the autocomplete drop-down menu when it appears below. Multiple relationships can be created.

trans-unit.source: Record a citation to, and/or information about a publication that is about or based on the use, study, or analysis of the unit of description. Include references to published facsimiles or transcriptions. (NOBRADE 5.4)
trans-unit.target: Record a citation to, and/or information about a publication that is about or based on the use, study, or analysis of the unit of description. Include references to published facsimiles or transcriptions. (NOBRADE 5.4)

trans-unit.source: Record specialized or other important information not accommodated by any of the defined elements of description. (NOBRADE 6.2)
trans-unit.target: Record specialized or other important information not accommodated by any of the defined elements of description. (NOBRADE 6.2)

trans-unit.source: Record information on the conservation status of the unit of description as well as conservation and/or restoration measures that have been, are being or should be taken in relation to it. (NOBRADE 6.1)
trans-unit.target: Record information on the conservation status of the unit of description as well as conservation and/or restoration measures that have been, are being or should be taken in relation to it. (NOBRADE 6.1)

trans-unit.source: Record a unique description identifier in accordance with local and/or national conventions. If the description is to be used internationally, record the code of the country in which the description was created in accordance with the latest version of ISO 3166 - Codes for the representation of names of countries. Where the creator of the description is an international organisation, give the organisational identifier in place of the country code.
trans-unit.target: Record a unique description identifier in accordance with local and/or national conventions. If the description is to be used internationally, record the code of the country in which the description was created in accordance with the latest version of ISO 3166 - Codes for the representation of names of countries. Where the creator of the description is an international organisation, give the organisational identifier in place of the country code.

trans-unit.source: Record the full authorised form of name(s) of the agency(ies) responsible for creating, modifying or disseminating the description or, alternatively, record a code for the agency in accordance with the national or international agency code standard.
trans-unit.target: Record the full authorised form of name(s) of the agency(ies) responsible for creating, modifying or disseminating the description or, alternatively, record a code for the agency in accordance with the national or international agency code standard.

trans-unit.source: Record the international, national and/or local rules or conventions followed in preparing the description. (NOBRADE 7.2)
trans-unit.target: Record the international, national and/or local rules or conventions followed in preparing the description. (NOBRADE 7.2)

trans-unit.source: Record the current status of the description, indicating whether it is a draft, finalized and/or revised or deleted.
trans-unit.target: Record the current status of the description, indicating whether it is a draft, finalized and/or revised or deleted.

trans-unit.source: Record whether the description consists of a minimal, partial or full level of detail in accordance with relevant international and/or national guidelines and/or rules.
trans-unit.target: Record whether the description consists of a minimal, partial or full level of detail in accordance with relevant international and/or national guidelines and/or rules.

trans-unit.source: Dates of Creation, revision and deletion
trans-unit.target: Dates of Creation, revision and deletion

trans-unit.source: Record the date(s) the entry was prepared and/or revised. (NOBRADE 7.3)
trans-unit.target: Record the date(s) the entry was prepared and/or revised. (NOBRADE 7.3)

trans-unit.source: Indicate the language(s) used to create the description of the archival material.
trans-unit.target: Indicate the language(s) used to create the description of the archival material.

trans-unit.source: Indicate the script(s) used to create the description of the archival material.
trans-unit.target: Indicate the script(s) used to create the description of the archival material.

trans-unit.source: Record citations for any external sources used in the archival description (such as the Scope and Content, Archival History, or Notes fields).
trans-unit.target: Record citations for any external sources used in the archival description (such as the Scope and Content, Archival History, or Notes fields).

trans-unit.source: Record notes on sources consulted in preparing the description and who prepared it. (NOBRADE 7.1)
trans-unit.target: Record notes on sources consulted in preparing the description and who prepared it. (NOBRADE 7.1)

trans-unit.source: This is a duplicate of record %1%
trans-unit.target: This is a duplicate of record %1%

trans-unit.source:
Label: Enter a name for the alternative reference code field that indicates its purpose and usage.
Reference Code: Enter a legacy reference code, alternative reference code, or any other alpha-numeric string associated with the record.'
trans-unit.target:
Label: Enter a name for the alternative reference code field that indicates its purpose and usage.
